ChatGPT 在提供家庭高血压管理信息方面优于 Bing人工智能工具 ChatGPT 和 Bing 对有关家庭血压监测方法的问题给出的答复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/ChatGPT-outperforms-Bing-in-providing-information-on-home-hypertension-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/ChatGPT-outperforms-Bing-in-providing-information-on-home-hypertension-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d9b02bd-3a48-4a38-96c4-2e88c27bbb15 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 08:49:00 -0500 ChatGPT outperforms Bing in providing information on home hypertension management
COVID-19 暴露了影响 ACB 群体疫苗接种的根深蒂固的结构性不平等非洲、加勒比和黑人 (ACB) 社区疫苗接种率低的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/COVID-19-exposes-deep-rooted-structural-inequities-affecting-vaccine-uptake-among-ACB-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/COVID-19-exposes-deep-rooted-structural-inequities-affecting-vaccine-uptake-among-ACB-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059d0dd0-1d94-45f7-ab67-9a4dc73e4a37 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 08:16:00 -0500 COVID-19 exposes deep-rooted structural inequities affecting vaccine uptake among ACB groups
考虑切换到 Quorn？它可以帮助降低 10% 的坏胆固醇一项新的临床营养研究调查了含有霉菌蛋白的家庭远程饮食干预是否会影响超重成年人的胆固醇和心血管疾病 (CVD) 的其他生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Thinking-of-switching-to-Quorn-It-could-help-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Thinking-of-switching-to-Quorn-It-could-help-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=805dbd9a-3e1e-467e-a5a4-288b17c92c88 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 07:26:00 -0500 Thinking of switching to Quorn? It could help lower bad cholesterol by 10%

Your dog, says recent study
从长远来看，即使是低水平的休闲时间体力活动也可以预防中风最近，科学家进行了系统回顾和荟萃分析，以更好地了解不同水平的休闲体力活动（LTPA）是否可以预防中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Even-low-levels-of-leisure-time-physical-activity-can-prevent-中风-in-the-long-term.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Even-low-levels-of-leisure-time-physical-activity-can-prevent-中风-in-the-long-term.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef6a3dc4-ac43-4561-a940-4546f7f9c414 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Even low levels of leisure-time physical activity can prevent stroke in the long term
久坐行为对每日步数与健康结果之间关系的影响研究人员探讨了久坐时间如何影响每日步数与死亡率和心血管疾病风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-impact-of-sedentary-behavior-on-the-relationship- Between-daily-step-counts-and-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-impact-of-sedentary-behavior-on-the-relationship- Between-daily-step-counts-and-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac9572ca-297c-4c97-8ba6-0145d79f5abd Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:39:00 -0500 The impact of sedentary behavior on the relationship between daily step counts and health outcomes

作为百万人类微生物组新核心实验室，华大智造赋能INRAE MetaGenoPolis“法国微生物-法国肠道”项目，推动宏基因组学研究华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，在 MetaGenoPolis 被选为法国国家农业、食品和环境研究所 (INRAE) 后，今天宣布与法国著名的国家农业、食品和环境研究所 (INRAE) 旗下的 MetaGenoPolis 达成合作协议。百万人类微生物组项目 (MMHP) 的核心实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/As-a-new-Core-Lab-under-the-Million-Microbiomes-from-Humans-Project-MGI-empowers-INRAE-MetaGenoPolis-in- e2809cLe-microbiote-francais-Le-French-Gute2809dproject-to-Propel-Metagenomics-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/As-a-new-Core-Lab-under-the-Million-Microbiomes-from-Humans-Project-MGI-empowers-INRAE-MetaGenoPolis-in- e2809cLe-microbiote-francais-Le-French-Gute2809dproject-to-Propel-Metagenomics-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30333ea2-dced-4248-9a3a-95825ca6e2d8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:12:00 -0500 As a new Core Lab under the Million Microbiomes from Humans Project, MGI empowers INRAE MetaGenoPolis in “Le microbiote français - Le French Gut”project to Propel Metagenomics Research
华大智造与 Prepaire Labs 建立战略合作伙伴关系，共同推进药物发现和精准医疗华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布在 2024 年中东MEDLAB 上与 Pr​​epaire Labs 合作，进一步赋能精准医疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Enters-Strategic-Partnership-with-Prepaire-Labs-to-Advance-Drug-Discovery-and-Precision-Medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Enters-Strategic-Partnership-with-Prepaire-Labs-to-Advance-Drug-Discovery-and-Precision-Medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddaace32-f67c-4974-b37f-d9afdd33b9d8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:06:00 -0500 MGI Enters Strategic Partnership with Prepaire Labs to Advance Drug Discovery and Precision Medicine
